Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
BackgroundPanel
Provides a custom JPanel with a background image.
CenteredListCellRenderer
A custom DefaultListCellRenderer subclass that centers text horizontally within each cell of a JList.
ClientMain
The `ClientMain2` class is responsible for managing the client-side network operations of the Risk game.
ClientRequestHandler
Handles incoming client requests and manages communication between clients and the game server.
ConquerContinentMission
Represents a mission where the player must conquer two specific continents.
ConquerContinentPlusOne
Represents a mission where the player must conquer two specific continents and control at least one additional continent.
ConquerCountriesMission
Represents a mission where the player must conquer a specific number of countries.
ConquerCountriesMissionPlusUnits
Represents a mission where the player must conquer a specific number of countries and ensure each country has a minimum number of units.
Continent
Represents a continent in a risk-like game, encapsulating its name, controlling player, bonus units, and constituent countries.
Country
Represents a country in the game.
CountryData
Represents the data for a country in the game.
CountryInitiator
Initializes and manages the loading and organization of countries and their neighboring relationships from a data file.
CountryInitiator
Initializes and manages country and continent data for the Risk game.
CountryNotFoundException
Represents an exception for when a specified country is not found within the game.
Dice
Represents a dice used in the game for generating random outcomes.
eliminatePlayerColorMission
Represents a mission where the player must eliminate all countries controlled by a player of a specific color.
FilePersistenceManager
Manages file persistence for players and their states in the game.
FilePersistenceManager
Manages file persistence for players in the game.
GameEventListener
Represents a listener for game-related events within the Risk game framework.
GameInfoPanel
Represents the information panel in the game's user interface.
GameLoop
Manages the main game loop, including unit distribution, attacks, and unit movements.
GamePanel
Represents the main game panel in the GUI, integrating various components and functionalities of the game.
GameServer
Manages incoming client connections, game state, and communication among clients in a Risk game server.
GameSetupPanel
Represents the panel for setting up the game, including player addition, color selection, and game start.
GeneratingMap
Represents the panel for generating and displaying the game map in the Risk game.
InvalidUnitException
Represents an exception for when an input does not correspond to a valid unit in the game.
MainMenuGui
Represents the main user interface for the Risk game, extending JFrame and implementing GameEventListener to handle game events.
MainMenuPanel
Represents the main menu panel of the game.
MissionCard
Represents the base class for all mission cards in the game.
NotANeighbourCountry
Represents an exception for when a specified country is not recognized as a neighboring country in the game.
PersistenceManager
Defines the persistence operations for player data management.
PersistenceManager
Defines the persistence operations for player data in the game.
Player
Represents a player in the game, holding various attributes such as name, ID, color, and the countries and continents controlled.
PlayerNotFoundException
Represents an exception for when a specified player is not found within the game.
ReadyPopUp
Represents a pop-up panel used in the game's UI to indicate that the game is waiting for other players to be ready.
Risk
The Risk class serves as the central hub for managing the game of Risk.
RiskAdministration
 
RiskInterface
Defines the core interface for the Risk game, encapsulating all essential game functionalities.
SetupGameGUI
Represents the setup GUI for the Risk game.
TitleSubPanel
Represents a sub-panel specifically designed for displaying the game title in the Risk game user interface.
UnitCard
Represents a unit card in the game.
